alert.note: Alert for City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:02PM EDT until June 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Northampton County in northeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Hertford County in northeastern North Carolina... Gates County in northeastern North Carolina... The City of Franklin in southeastern Virginia... Isle of Wight County in southeastern Virginia... Southampton County in southeastern Virginia... The City of Suffolk in southeastern Virginia... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 202 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gatesville to near Conway, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Boykins around 215 PM EDT. Newsoms and Whaleyville around 220 PM EDT. Holland around 230 PM EDT. Downtown Suffolk and Carrsville around 235 PM EDT. Windsor, Isle Of Wight, Kings Fork and Zuni around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Vicksville, Milwaukee, Longview, Savage, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Dort, Chuckatuck, Dory and Lees Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: City of Franklin; City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton
